sentences.sContent: I hope I’ll have finished the work by the end of the month .
sentences.sCn: 我希望我这个月底能完成工作。

sentences.sContent: She earns about £350 a month (= each month ) .
We update the schedule at least once a month.
sentences.sCn: 我们至少每月更新一次日程表。

sentences.sContent: ...Why does Claudette spend a month in France every year...
...Last month the Academy of Medical Royal Colleges (AMRC) published a report saying that obesity is the greatest public health issue affecting the UK and urging government to do something...
...The pair are due to meet some wealthiest people in China next month and India in March...
...You've known from month the report is due today...
...Four million people get hired every month in the U...
...I spent a month in Japan in 2006...

words.tran: 每月的，每月一次的；有效期为一个月的

trans.tranOther: one of the 12 named periods of time that a year is divided into
